Text:
I appreciate your hard work. As expected, you've
compiled a flawless dossier on Princess Alexia
and Master Shadow's movements.
I'm glad to be of help.

It's wonderful how much data you've gathered without
arousing the princess's suspicions. You were definitely
the right person to ask.
What's the matter?

Um... Why am I monitoring and reporting on the
Princess and Master Shadow's movements? Is this
a mission?

O-Of course! We always need to gather data on Master
Shadow's surroundings in case a bad apple...er, in case
someone from the Cult tries to get near him.

As far as I could tell, the Cult of Diablos hasn't
been up to anything in either Master Shadow
or Princess Alexia's immediate vicinity.
Let me remind you of something important, Nu. May I?

Nobody knows where the Cult has infiltrated. We must
be on alert at all times.

By relaxing our guard, it gives bad apples room to
take advantage and deal us a blow from which we
cannot recover.
I was just wondering... Who's the bad...apple?
Um...it's just an example.
Pardon me...

Anyway, one other thing... Look at this section you
have written here.

Master Shadow and Princess Alexia frequently play
"fetch"... What on earth does this mean?

If I take these words at face value, she wants him to
get something for her... Is it some kind of secret code?

Princess Alexia throws a gold coin as far as she can
and shouts "Fetch!"

Wait. This means exactly what it says? She throws
a coin and Master Shadow retrieves it...?

Yes, exactly what it says. Except it doesn't note the
special retrieval method.

What special method? The report is not clear to me.
Can you provide an additional explanation?

The retrieval method is as follows: Master Shadow
picks the coin up between his teeth and brings it
back to her.

Did you say that Master Shadow picks up the gold coin
with his teeth and brings it back? Please tell me I'm
imagining this.

No, you're not imagining it. That's what happens.
That's what I wrote in the report, as well.

Moreover, there's an alternate version of the "fetch"
activity, as noted in my report...

Though she tries to maintain a professional demeanor,
the bewilderment on Nu's face is plain to see.

Are the things written here true? I don't doubt your
version of events, but...

Yes. On his return, the princess strokes Master
Shadow's head and says "Good boy, well done"...
More precisely, in the alternative version she
strokes, pats and rubs him.
Strokes, pats and rubs? Master Shadow's...head?

Beta utters the words slowly, punctuated with pauses
as if trying to calm herself down.

But she has reached her limit, and there's a sudden
outburst of emotion.

What in the world?! What has that girl... No, what
has Princess Alexia done to Master Shadow?!

She's turned him into her dog! I don't care if she's
a princess, I will never forgive her for this!
P-Please don't get mad...
I'm sorry. I lost my composure.
But, I can't believe it...

I know... I thought it was outrageous as well, but I
stuck to my mission to monitor and record everything.

I deemed it inappropriate to interfere, unless there
was a risk to Master Shadow's life or limb.
Yes...that's fine. You made the correct decision.

(Although I had an outburst, as one of the Seven
Shadows, I am supposed to be in control of my
emotions.)
Moreover, Master Shadow didn't look distressed...
What?! He wasn't...opposed to it?

Well, Master Shadow always does things for a reason.
We shouldn't be hasty in doubting his motives.

Besides, I am sure that this "fetch" activity
signifies something very important.

(I'm trying to get my head around the meaning of this
thing called "fetch", but...)
I can't...
She instantly dispels the thoughts from her head.

I can't presume to know what Master Shadow is
thinking...

In particular, it's nearly impossible to discern the
meaning behind this "fetch", though I'm sure there
is one.
Even for a senior Seven Shadow such as you, Beta?

Yes, he has been my guiding light for many years,
yet I've only just begun to understand his thought
process.

Just when I get near, he somehow goes even further
ahead and astounds me even more with his greatness
and foresight.
Oops, the conversation's getting sidetracked.

Smiling wryly, her eyes fall once again on the report.
Then, after turning the page, the smile stiffens to a
grimace.

I-I see. The report says Master Shadow and the
princess... Usually leave school arm in arm.
Yes. The princess actively links her arm with his.
A-c-t-i-v-e-l-y...? Hmm, of course...

She seemed to be parading him around to show off,
but I suspect this also signifies something else.

Parading...him? A-Are you sure you're not mistaken?
Hmm, of course you must be right.

Nu, you might be working a little too hard. Ask Gamma
for help, so you can rest.
O-Okay. Thank you.

Surely there must be some mistake... But even if she
did link arms and parade him around, there's nothing
unusual about that...

Okay, calm down Beta. Nothing weird is going on.
It's what lovers do... That's all.

As if trying to persuade herself of that,
Beta returns to reading the report.
Hmm, hmm...

Um, may I ask you a question? Have you ever played
the "ahh" game? With someone of the opposite sex,
of course.
Excuse me?
Nu struggles to reply to the unexpected question

When he was small, I'd make Master Shadow say "ahh"
and he'd open his mouth wide.

But as adults, of course, the game can take on a
whole new meaning.

Then, after he'd gone "ahh", I would notice some
ice cream left around his mouth.

Of course, without thinking, adults take their finger
and wipe it off... Then they lick...their...finger...
I-Is something wrong?

Lick it off! Ahhhhhh! That girl! I can't bear to
think what she's doing to Master Shadow!

U-Um... She hasn't taken things that far, so you can
rest assured.
Aahhh...

Beta's eyes mist over with tears. Nu notices this and
looks at her worriedly.

It should be me that's playing "ahh" with him...
I've been longing to...

On saying that, Beta's hand starts to shake and she
slowly clenches her fist.
U-Um... Beta? You're crumpling up the report...
The trembling in her hand suddenly stops.
Beta...?

Aargh! How did that girl get so close to
Master Shadow?!
*bang, bang, bang*

U-Um... Beta? If you keep hitting the desk as hard as
that... It'll break.

It should be me! It should be me doing the things in
this report with Master Shadowww!
